articles.title: Doja Cat stops performance to help fan in distress
articles.description: Doja Cat recently stopped her set at Lollapalooza Argentina when she noticed an audience member in distress.
articles.content: Doja Cat recently stopped her set at Lollapalooza Argentina when she noticed an audience member in distress. As per Billboard, a viral clip from her set shows the star pausing and directing the sound to be cut during a performance of her song 'Option... [1188 chars]

articles.title: Doja Cat Pauses Lollapalooza Argentina Show To Help Fan
articles.description: Doja Cat stopped her performance at Lollapalooza Argentina to help a fan in the crowd. Doja Cat took several minutes to help a fan during her set at Lollapal...
articles.content:
Doja Cat took several minutes to help a fan during her set at Lollapalooza Argentina on Saturday night. After making sure they were alright, Doja spoke about the importance of safety at concerts.

articles.title: Lollapalooza Argentina: Doja Cat Stops Performance to Help Fan
articles.description: Doja Cat stopped her set at Lollapalooza Argentina for nearly five minutes when she noticed an audience member in distress.
articles.content:
Doja Cat stopped her set at Lollapalooza Argentina for nearly five minutes when she noticed an audience member in distress Saturday night (March 19).

articles.title: Former Pumas star Aramburu killed in Paris
articles.description: Former Argentina rugby international Federico Aramburu has been shot and killed in Paris after an altercation in a bar.
articles.content:
Former Argentina rugby player Federico Martin Aramburu has been killed in Paris early on Saturday, he was 42.
The Paris prosecutor's office confirmed to the Associated Press that a murder investigation has been opened.

articles.title: Federico Martin Aramburu: Former Argentina rugby international killed in shooting in Paris
articles.description: Federico Martin Aramburu was capped 22 times and represented his country at the 2007 World Cup in France. Alongside his international appearances, Aramburu played for Biarritz, Perpignan, and Dax in the French league during his career.
articles.content:
Former Argentina rugby player Federico Martin Aramburu has been killed in a shooting in Paris.
Prosecutors told the Associated Press that a murder investigation had been opened after Aramburu died in the street, with shots having been fired.
